nodes.name: sap.ui.suite.TaskCircle
nodes.description: This control shows a circle which radius and color depends on the given parameters

nodes.name: sap.ui.suite.TaskCircleColor
nodes.description:
Defined color values for the Task Circle Control

This enum is part of the 'sap/ui/suite/library' module export and must be accessed by the property 'TaskCircleColor'.

nodes.name: sap.ui.suite.VerticalProgressIndicator
nodes.description: This control shows a vertical progress bar in dependency of the given percentage.

symbols.name: sap.ui.suite.TaskCircle
symbols.description: This control shows a circle which radius and color depends on the given parameters

experimental.text: The API may change. Use with care.

properties.name: color
properties.description: Color of the circle. The default color is red.

properties.name: maxValue
properties.description: Upper limit of the displayed values. Default is 100.

properties.name: minValue
properties.description: Lower limit of the displayed values. Default is 0.

properties.name: value
properties.description: Current value of the task circle to be displayed. In dependency of the parameters maxValue and minValue it controls the size of the circle.

associations.name: ariaDescribedBy
associations.description: Association to controls / ids which describe this control (see WAI-ARIA attribute aria-describedby).

associations.name: ariaLabelledBy
associations.description: Association to controls / ids which label this control (see WAI-ARIA attribute aria-labelledby).

parameters.name: sId
parameters.description: id for the new control, generated automatically if no id is given

parameters.name: mSettings
parameters.description: initial settings for the new control

constructor.description:
Constructor for a new TaskCircle.

Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

events.name: press
events.description: Event is fired when the user clicks the control.

methods.name: addAriaDescribedBy

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: vAriaDescribedBy
parameters.description: The ariaDescribedBy to add; if empty, nothing is inserted

methods.description: Adds some ariaDescribedBy into the association ariaDescribedBy.

methods.name: addAriaLabelledBy

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: vAriaLabelledBy
parameters.description: The ariaLabelledBy to add; if empty, nothing is inserted

methods.description: Adds some ariaLabelledBy into the association ariaLabelledBy.

methods.name: attachPress

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: oData
parameters.description: An application-specific payload object that will be passed to the event handler along with the event object when firing the event

parameters.name: fnFunction
parameters.description: The function to be called when the event occurs

parameters.name: oListener
parameters.description: Context object to call the event handler with. Defaults to this sap.ui.suite.TaskCircle itself

methods.description:
Attaches event handler fnFunction to the press event of this sap.ui.suite.TaskCircle.

When called, the context of the event handler (its this) will be bound to oListener if specified, otherwise it will be bound to this sap.ui.suite.TaskCircle itself.

Event is fired when the user clicks the control.

methods.name: detachPress

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: fnFunction
parameters.description: The function to be called, when the event occurs

parameters.name: oListener
parameters.description: Context object on which the given function had to be called

methods.description:
Detaches event handler fnFunction from the press event of this sap.ui.suite.TaskCircle.

The passed function and listener object must match the ones used for event registration.

methods.name: sap.ui.suite.TaskCircle.extend

returnValue.description: Created class / constructor function

parameters.name: sClassName
parameters.description: Name of the class being created

parameters.name: oClassInfo
parameters.description: Object literal with information about the class

parameters.name: FNMetaImpl
parameters.description: Constructor function for the metadata object; if not given, it defaults to the metadata implementation used by this class

methods.description:
Creates a new subclass of class sap.ui.suite.TaskCircle with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo.

oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in sap.ui.core.Control.extend.

methods.name: firePress

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: mParameters
parameters.description: Parameters to pass along with the event

methods.description: Fires event press to attached listeners.

methods.name: focus
methods.description: Puts the focus to the control.

methods.name: getAriaDescribedBy
methods.description: Returns array of IDs of the elements which are the current targets of the association ariaDescribedBy.

methods.name: getAriaLabelledBy
methods.description: Returns array of IDs of the elements which are the current targets of the association ariaLabelledBy.

methods.name: getColor

returnValue.description: Value of property color

methods.description:
Gets current value of property color.

Color of the circle. The default color is red.

Default value is Gray.

methods.name: getMaxValue

returnValue.description: Value of property maxValue

methods.description:
Gets current value of property maxValue.

Upper limit of the displayed values. Default is 100.

Default value is 100.

methods.name: sap.ui.suite.TaskCircle.getMetadata

returnValue.description: Metadata object describing this class

methods.description: Returns a metadata object for class sap.ui.suite.TaskCircle.

methods.name: getMinValue

returnValue.description: Value of property minValue

methods.description:
Gets current value of property minValue.

Lower limit of the displayed values. Default is 0.

Default value is 0.

methods.name: getValue

returnValue.description: Value of property value

methods.description:
Gets current value of property value.

Current value of the task circle to be displayed. In dependency of the parameters maxValue and minValue it controls the size of the circle.

Default value is 0.

methods.name: removeAllAriaDescribedBy

returnValue.description: An array of the removed elements (might be empty)

methods.description: Removes all the controls in the association named ariaDescribedBy.

methods.name: removeAllAriaLabelledBy

returnValue.description: An array of the removed elements (might be empty)

methods.description: Removes all the controls in the association named ariaLabelledBy.

methods.name: removeAriaDescribedBy

returnValue.description: The removed ariaDescribedBy or null

parameters.name: vAriaDescribedBy
parameters.description: The ariaDescribedBy to be removed or its index or ID

methods.description: Removes an ariaDescribedBy from the association named ariaDescribedBy.

methods.name: removeAriaLabelledBy

returnValue.description: The removed ariaLabelledBy or null

parameters.name: vAriaLabelledBy
parameters.description: The ariaLabelledBy to be removed or its index or ID

methods.description: Removes an ariaLabelledBy from the association named ariaLabelledBy.

methods.name: setColor

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: sColor
parameters.description: New value for property color

methods.description:
Sets a new value for property color.

Color of the circle. The default color is red.

When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

Default value is Gray.

methods.name: setMaxValue

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: iMaxValue
parameters.description: New value for property maxValue

methods.description:
Sets a new value for property maxValue.

Upper limit of the displayed values. Default is 100.

When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

Default value is 100.

methods.name: setMinValue

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: iMinValue
parameters.description: New value for property minValue

methods.description:
Sets a new value for property minValue.

Lower limit of the displayed values. Default is 0.

When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

Default value is 0.

methods.name: setValue

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: iValue
parameters.description: New value for property value

methods.description:
Sets a new value for property value.

Current value of the task circle to be displayed. In dependency of the parameters maxValue and minValue it controls the size of the circle.

When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

Default value is 0.

symbols.title: class sap.ui.suite.TaskCircle
symbols.subTitle: Deprecated in version: 1.108
symbols.deprecatedText: Deprecated as of version 1.108. there's no replacement for this functionality as no active use cases are known

symbols.name: sap.ui.suite.TaskCircleColor
symbols.description:
Defined color values for the Task Circle Control

This enum is part of the 'sap/ui/suite/library' module export and must be accessed by the property 'TaskCircleColor'.
symbols.title: enum sap.ui.suite.TaskCircleColor

symbols.name: sap.ui.suite.VerticalProgressIndicator
symbols.description: This control shows a vertical progress bar in dependency of the given percentage. Only values between 0 and 100 are valid.

experimental.text: The API may change. Use with care.

properties.name: percentage
properties.description: The numerical value between 0 and 100 which determines the height of the vertical bar. Values higher than 100 will be displayed as 100%, values lower than zero will be displayed as 0%.

associations.name: ariaDescribedBy
associations.description: Association to controls / ids which describe this control (see WAI-ARIA attribute aria-describedby).

associations.name: ariaLabelledBy
associations.description: Association to controls / ids which label this control (see WAI-ARIA attribute aria-labelledby).

parameters.name: sId
parameters.description: id for the new control, generated automatically if no id is given

parameters.name: mSettings
parameters.description: initial settings for the new control

constructor.description:
Constructor for a new VerticalProgressIndicator.

Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

events.name: press
events.description: Event is fired when the user clicks the control.

methods.name: addAriaDescribedBy

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: vAriaDescribedBy
parameters.description: The ariaDescribedBy to add; if empty, nothing is inserted

methods.description: Adds some ariaDescribedBy into the association ariaDescribedBy.

methods.name: addAriaLabelledBy

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: vAriaLabelledBy
parameters.description: The ariaLabelledBy to add; if empty, nothing is inserted

methods.description: Adds some ariaLabelledBy into the association ariaLabelledBy.

methods.name: attachPress

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: oData
parameters.description: An application-specific payload object that will be passed to the event handler along with the event object when firing the event

parameters.name: fnFunction
parameters.description: The function to be called when the event occurs

parameters.name: oListener
parameters.description: Context object to call the event handler with. Defaults to this sap.ui.suite.VerticalProgressIndicator itself

methods.description:
Attaches event handler fnFunction to the press event of this sap.ui.suite.VerticalProgressIndicator.

When called, the context of the event handler (its this) will be bound to oListener if specified, otherwise it will be bound to this sap.ui.suite.VerticalProgressIndicator itself.

Event is fired when the user clicks the control.

methods.name: detachPress

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: fnFunction
parameters.description: The function to be called, when the event occurs

parameters.name: oListener
parameters.description: Context object on which the given function had to be called

methods.description:
Detaches event handler fnFunction from the press event of this sap.ui.suite.VerticalProgressIndicator.

The passed function and listener object must match the ones used for event registration.

returnValue.description: Created class / constructor function

parameters.name: sClassName
parameters.description: Name of the class being created

parameters.name: oClassInfo
parameters.description: Object literal with information about the class

parameters.name: FNMetaImpl
parameters.description: Constructor function for the metadata object; if not given, it defaults to the metadata implementation used by this class

methods.description:
Creates a new subclass of class sap.ui.suite.VerticalProgressIndicator with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo.

oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in sap.ui.core.Control.extend.

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: mParameters
parameters.description: Parameters to pass along with the event

methods.description: Fires event press to attached listeners.

methods.name: focus
methods.description: Puts the focus to the control.

methods.name: getAriaDescribedBy
methods.description: Returns array of IDs of the elements which are the current targets of the association ariaDescribedBy.

methods.name: getAriaLabelledBy
methods.description: Returns array of IDs of the elements which are the current targets of the association ariaLabelledBy.

methods.name: sap.ui.suite.VerticalProgressIndicator.getMetadata

returnValue.description: Metadata object describing this class

methods.description: Returns a metadata object for class sap.ui.suite.VerticalProgressIndicator.

methods.name: getPercentage

returnValue.description: Value of property percentage

methods.description:
Gets current value of property percentage.

The numerical value between 0 and 100 which determines the height of the vertical bar. Values higher than 100 will be displayed as 100%, values lower than zero will be displayed as 0%.

methods.name: removeAllAriaDescribedBy

returnValue.description: An array of the removed elements (might be empty)

methods.description: Removes all the controls in the association named ariaDescribedBy.

methods.name: removeAllAriaLabelledBy

returnValue.description: An array of the removed elements (might be empty)

methods.description: Removes all the controls in the association named ariaLabelledBy.

methods.name: removeAriaDescribedBy

returnValue.description: The removed ariaDescribedBy or null

parameters.name: vAriaDescribedBy
parameters.description: The ariaDescribedBy to be removed or its index or ID

methods.description: Removes an ariaDescribedBy from the association named ariaDescribedBy.

methods.name: removeAriaLabelledBy

parameters.name: vAriaLabelledBy
parameters.description: The ariaLabelledBy to be removed or its index or ID

methods.description: Removes an ariaLabelledBy from the association named ariaLabelledBy.

methods.name: setPercentage

returnValue.description: this to allow method chaining

methods.description: Property setter for the Percentage, which determines the height of the vertical bar. Values higher than 100 will be displayed as 100%, values lower than zero will be displayed as 0%. A new rendering is not necessary, only the bar will be moved
